item.title: CVE-2021-31410|2024-09-17T02:37:25.412Z -- vaadin -- designer
item.description: Overly relaxed configuration of frontend resources server in Vaadin Designer versions 4.3.0 through 4.6.3 allows remote attackers to access project sources via crafted HTTP request.
